front.title: Protocol Independent Multicast Version 2, Dense Mode Specification

abstract.t: This specification defines a multicast routing algorithm for multicast groups that are densely distributed across an internet. The protocol is unicast routing protocol independent. It is based on the PIM sparse-mode [PIMSM] and employs the same packet formats. This protocol is called dense-mode PIM. The foundation of this design was largely built on [Deering91].
